# stringRepresentation

**Instance Property**

A string representation of the version.

## Declaration

```swift
var stringRepresentation: String { get }
```

## Discussion

The string representation uses the following format: `<major>.<minor>.<patch>`.

## Accessing Version Data

- **majorVersion**: The standard’s major version number.
- **minorVersion**: The standard’s minor version number.
- **patchVersion**: The standard’s patch version number.
title: stringRepresentation
